lever.additional:
Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
We are looking for passionate leaders, who have strong experience in leading the digital content in media platforms. The candidate must be strong in leading and executing content and campaign creativity, with an ability to conceive interesting ideas for new content and experience in curating and promoting digital content.

You will be part of mission of leap frogging Indonesia to the digital era, bringing Gojek's values through digital platforms and deliver to all 250 million Indonesians!

We are looking for passionate leaders, who have strong experience in leading the digital content in media platforms. The candidate must be strong in leading and executing content and campaign creativity, with an ability to conceive interesting ideas for new content and experience in curating and promoting digital content.

lists.content:
• Lead the Social Media team to ensures that every content and campaign produced succeeds (quantity and quality driven results) and amplified well and be discovered by our audience with the goal to go viral
  • Accountable for the success of each and every content and campaign thru in-depth reporting of quantity and quality results and constant/close monitoring
  • Reviews and proof-reads each and every content that goes live
  • Ensures timely delivery of projects with the goal of ultimate client satisfaction
  • Develops campaigns from concept to production and implementation as required by advertiser and internal brand owners (editorial)
  • Ensures quality control of campaign concepts and content

• Graduate of Journalism or Mass Communication, Marketing or equivalent
  • At least 10 year experience in Digital Marketing (Web, Social Media, Email, Mobile), with Digital/Search Engine Optimization (SEO) experience
  • Experience in leading the Content Production and Digital Marketing (Writing, Strategies)
  • Expert in Content Management System (CMS) and digital platforms, including the analytics
  • Experience in handling special digital projects (End-to-End)
  • Multitasking, flexible and willing to extend hours to finish deadlines
